g-0: ^I'm looking for medicine to give to Ulrich.
^He sent me here... I think? He's tough to decipher.
^Ha! Old Ulrich giving you a hard time? Don't worry, you've come to the right place.
^We make him a nasal spray out of some special algae we forage around here.
^I could whip you up a batch right now, if you're willing to deliver it to Ulrich yourself.
g-1: ^[Vera steps into her hut and comes out with a container in her hands.]
^You best be off now. Don't leave poor Ulrich sniffling too much longer!
